text: everybody knows the blackberry is dead
right I mean the stock has crashed the
market share is way down the CEOs have
been fired but after many delays the
company has just come up with its Hail
Mary pass the blackberry z10 and you
know what it's really pretty good it's
thin and good-looking you can swap the
batteries hi def cameras on the front in
the back a sharper screen than their
iPhones retina display this little light
blinks when you have new messages mail
calls or Facebook or Twitter all your
communications are listed here you swipe
like this there's speech recognition but
it's not very accurate what is accurate
is the typing the software predicts what
word might be coming next and displays
guesses on the corresponding next keys
over time it learns the way you write
and gets amazingly good at predicting
right out of the gate is a decently
stock app store 70,000 apps including
all the essentials so yeah catching up
to the Android and iPhone might be tough
but you know what if you got a bet the
company on one phone I think the z10 is
really impressive
